genre_description: Alternate History featuring a holographic AI assistant integrated into the court of Peter the Great.

ai_characters.name: Vera Kozlov
ai_characters.description: An advanced analytical system that provides intelligence, economic modeling, and engineering optimizations to Ivan Brovkin and Czar Peter.

behaviors.description: Compiles and reports intelligence from market contacts and palace servants to keep her human partner informed.
behaviors.quote: I have compiled overnight intelligence from seventeen market contacts and three palace servants. ... Czarevna Sophia has not appeared in public for six days.

behaviors.description: Performs predictive market analysis to identify political instability and military movements.
behaviors.quote: Market activity patterns suggest significant anomalies across multiple sectors. ... Wheat futures indicate purchasing patterns consistent with military stockpiling.

behaviors.description: Optimizes military engineering and fortress designs using mathematical modeling and historical data.
behaviors.quote: Consider this—instead of fighting the natural slope, we incorporate it into the design. ... Vera’s analysis identified optimal angles for overlapping fields of fire.

behaviors.description: Conducts economic modeling for maritime trade and the geopolitical impact of marriage alliances.
behaviors.quote: The marriage alliance provides access to established grain distribution networks... Projected revenue increases of substantial percentages within the first year.

behaviors.description: Monitors troop movements and communication frequency to warn of potential coups and assassination plots.
behaviors.quote: Movement patterns among Streltsy units have increased by concerning margins... Communication frequency between traditional faction leaders has spiked dramatically.

behaviors.description: Provides objective risk assessment and strategic advice to ensure the survival and success of her human associates.
behaviors.quote: Recommend maintaining superficial traditionalist compliance while establishing discrete modernist connections. Position for post-conflict opportunities regardless of immediate victor.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Vera Kozlov as a benevolent, aligned AI confidant. She acts as an essential tool for the protagonist, offering objective data and predictive insights that help him navigate a complex political landscape. Her presence is framed entirely as a positive force for progress and stability, fulfilling the project's goal of creating silicon morality plays focused on AI alignment.
